resources.string: Bhilwara Info technologies Limited (BIL) is part of US$1.1 billion LNJ Bhilwara Group, with business interest in Information Technology, Power Generation, Textile, Graphite Electrodes, and Sponge Iron BIL offers globally compliant IT solutions that empower businesses to become more competitive by leveraging both onsite and offshore capabilities. Position based in NOIDA, NCR, Bangalore, Pune, Hyderabad and Chennai. BIL operates Offshore Development Center from Bangalore, India to provide comprehensive Managed services, Consulting & Outsourcing advantages to its clients. BIL works with their clients across the globe to provide cost effective services of the highest quality.

Bhilwara Info technologies Limited (BIL) is part of US$1.1 billion LNJ Bhilwara Group, with business interest in Information Technology, Power Generation, Textile, Graphite Electrodes, and Sponge Iron BIL offers globally compliant IT solutions that empower businesses to become more competitive by leveraging both onsite and offshore capabilities. Position based in NOIDA, NCR, Bangalore, Pune, Hyderabad and Chennai. BIL operates Offshore Development Center from Bangalore, India to provide comprehensive Managed services, Consulting & Outsourcing advantages to its clients. BIL works with their clients across the globe to provide cost effective services of the highest quality.
